name: fishlog
description: An app for logging fish you have caught.

scripts.build: npm run css && cp node_modules/ion-rangeslider/css/ion.rangeSlider.css src/css && cp node_modules/ion-rangeslider/js/ion.rangeSlider.min.js public/dist && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/dist && npm run webpack

author: xolof
